data.title: Minnesota Timberwolves Roster
data.meta_description: Minnesota Timberwolves scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Anthony Edwards was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 2020 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Anthony Edwards signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on November 29, 2020. Anthony Edwards signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 8, 2023.

Karl-Anthony Towns was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 2015 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Karl-Anthony Towns signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 6, 2015. Karl-Anthony Towns signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on September 23, 2018. Karl-Anthony Towns signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 7, 2022.

Draft Rights to Jaden McDaniels, the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2020 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Oklahoma City Thunder on November 20, 2020. Jaden McDaniels signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on November 29, 2020. Jaden McDaniels signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on October 23, 2023.

Draft Rights to Leonard Miller, the #3 pick in the Second Round of the 2023 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the San Antonio Spurs on June 23, 2023. Leonard Miller signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 8, 2023.

Draft Rights to Josh Minott, the #15 pick in the Second Round of the 2022 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Charlotte Hornets on June 24, 2022. Josh Minott signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 22, 2022.

Draft Rights to Wendell Moore, Jr., the #26 pick in the First Round of the 2022 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Houston Rockets on June 24, 2022. Wendell Moore, Jr. signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 7, 2022.

Nickeil Alexander-Walker was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Utah Jazz on February 9, 2023. Nickeil Alexander-Walker re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 9, 2023.

Mike Conley was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Utah Jazz on February 9, 2023. Mike Conley signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on February 22, 2024.

Rudy Gobert was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Utah Jazz on July 6, 2022.

Monte Morris was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Detroit Pistons on February 8, 2024.

Kyle Anderson signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 7, 2022.

Luka Garza signed a contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on April 4, 2024.

Jordan McLaughlin signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on September 14, 2021.

Naz Reid signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 18, 2019. Naz Reid re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on June 27, 2023.

T.J. Warren signed a contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on March 6, 2024. T.J. Warren re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on March 16, 2024. T.J. Warren re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on March 27, 2024.
